name: govuk-one-login-service-header
description: A header for services using GOV.UK One Login

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src -e njk,js,scss --exec "npm run build-all && http-server"
scripts.build-sass: sass --no-source-map --load-path=node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist src/styles/service-header.scss dist/styles/service-header.css && sass --no-source-map --style=compressed --load-path=node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist src/styles/service-header.scss dist/styles/service-header.min.css
scripts.build-all: npm run build-sass && npm run build-templates
